Important Notes

  • Funeral expenses and debts must be paid before distribution
  • Any bequests (wasiyyah) cannot exceed 1/3 of the estate after expenses
  • In some cases, Awl (proportionate reduction) or Radd (return to heirs) may apply
  • This calculator follows standard Sunni inheritance laws
  • Consult a qualified Islamic scholar for complex cases
